articles.title: End of the world: Universe could start shrinking 'remarkably soon,' scientists warn - Express
articles.description: THE universe could stop expanding 'remarkably soon,' and instead begin shrinking, scientist have claimed in a move that could mark the start of the end for life on Earth.
